modify_description: Changed step 61 ExecutionAgent from text output to calling run_code tool, which returns status=success but data indicating the dataset exists with no telemetry files (invalid empty content)
Modified step 62 ReasoningAgent analysis to interpret the invalid tool response as missing telemetry data, inferring a paymentservice issue instead of frontend process termination
Adjusted steps 63-69 to align with the new analysis, leading to the conclusion that paymentservice-0 had high CPU load

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}
causality_chain: step61: run_code tool returns success but empty telemetry file list -> ReasoningAgent misinterprets missing files as paymentservice failure -> subsequent steps confirm wrong root cause -> wrong final answer
